document_data.name: Amern
document_data.mainbody:
'''Amern''' was a stablemaster and [[horse]] trainer at [[Amern's Stables]] in the [[Port District]] of [[Procampur]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|3}}

He was old and experienced at his craft. He was formerly in the employ of the noble [[Jirin|House Jirin]], departed for "his own reasons".
